content: Everyone has the right to education. Education shall be free, at least in the elementary and fundamental stages. Elementary education shall be compulsory. Technical and professional education shall be made generally available and higher education shall be equally accessible to all on the basis of merit.
translations: ita:Ogni individuo ha diritto all’istruzione. L’istruzione deve essere gratuita almeno per quanto riguarda le classi element
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by jakov (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
